solution_line_template: Benny spent a total of ${total_spent} - ${soft_drinks_total} on soft drinks = $<<{total_spent}-{soft_drinks_total}={candy_bars_total}>>{candy_bars_total} on candy bars.
Benny spent ${candy_bars_total} / {num_candy_bars} candy bars = $<<{candy_bars_total}/{num_candy_bars}={candy_bar_price}>>{candy_bar_price} for each candy bar.
